title: Yeardley Smith: On Voicing Lisa Simpson and Becoming an LGBT Advocate
description: Yeardley Smith, who plays "Lisa" on the hit show The Simpsons, tells WSJ's Veronica Dagher how she learned to accept her voice and how she uses it to be an ally to the LGBT community.
itunes:author: The Wall Street Journal
itunes:summary: Yeardley Smith, who plays "Lisa" on the hit show The Simpsons, tells WSJ's Veronica Dagher how she learned to accept her voice and how she uses it to be an ally to the LGBT community.
